duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on meaningful projects related to Extraocular Devices, Instrumentation, Visualization, or Intraocular Device development.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver results aligned to business needs.
Assist in the design, testing, and iteration of implantable devices and mechanical components.

education_certification.credential: Enrollment in an accredited university or college for at least one semester prior to the internship or co-op, pursuing a Bachelors level degree in Mechanical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Physics, or related major, with a minimum cumulative GPA of 2.8/4.0.
